body:
Comment 2: 
All build metrics have degraded between Dec 3 and 6, but pause of a single GC has
significantly improved:
http://goperfd.appspot.com/perfdetail?commit=5298d82f682fecf71a7570c6625b2d80880749ff&commit0=0ec4ea1f19b07d44bd0635a4cb45368962765f34&kind=builder&builder=linux-amd64&benchmark=build
